ref: 3356 kuváya m. ʻ a partic. kind of bird ʼ MaitrS., kváyi- m. TS. (cf. also kudhi -- m. ʻ owl ʼ Gal. ~ kudhī -- m. ʻ fool ʼ Pañcat). [EWA i 283 onom.? -- But poss., directly or through pop. etym., ku -- and váyas1]
H. kuhī f. ʻ a bird of prey smaller than a hawk ʼ, kūhī f. ʻ a bird of the hawk tribe ʼ, kūī f. ʻ hawk ʼ < *kuvayikā -- .
